entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
